objective: Write and execute basic Python programs that utilize sequential processing, variables, operators, and input/output functions.
Implement program logic using conditional statements based on boolean expressions.
Use loops to control the flow of iterative execution of code blocks.
Write and call reusable code blocks using functions with parameters and return values.
Identify, describe, and correct syntax, runtime, and logic errors in Python code.
Demonstrate use of simple data structures (lists, tuples, and arrays) to store and retrieve data.
Read and write data to and from text files using appropriate file handling techniques.
Utilize exception handling to gracefully manage errors and prevent program crashes.
Use dictionaries to store and access data using key-value pairs.
Design and implement object-oriented programs using classes, objects, attributes, and methods.
Utilize inheritance to create hierarchical relationships between classes to promote code reuse.
Develop basic web applications using Flask to interact with APIs and display data.
